text: haey anak nung kheunh puokke trauv ke noam towkean nork daoy aonlomton teang ameasa promteang puokke luoch meul tow nork noh ( daoy phyokhlach) . rie banda anak del mean chomnue vinh ban niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa puok del khatabng kuchea puok del khatabng khluon eng ning kruosaear robsa puokke now thngai barlok . chaur doeng tha pitabrakd nasa puok del bampean ku sthetnow knong tearounakamm chea rieng rhaut
